title: DiceRollComponent
description: Schema for a single component of a dice roll or a static modifier.

diceCount.description: Number of dice to roll. Use 0 for static modifiers.

dieType.description: Type of die (e.g., 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 20). Use 0 or 1 if diceCount is 0 (static modifier).

category.description: What the dice roll is for (e.g., Damage, Healing, Bonus, Penalty, HP).

subType.description: The specific type within the category (e.g., for 'Damage' -> 'Slashing', 'Fire'; for 'Bonus' -> 'AttackRolls').

staticValue.description: The value if this is a static modifier. If diceCount > 0, this might be 0.

valueSource.description: Optional: If the value is derived from a character stat (e.g., 'Strength_Modifier', 'Proficiency_Bonus').

notes.description: Optional notes or comments about this dice roll component.
